entry.title: After Taming Rebels, Ethiopia's Leader Faces New Threat
entry.content: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed, a former Nobel Peace Prize winner, had forged a coalition to fight rebels in Tigray. Now his allies are turning on him.

entry.title: Two Cyclones Hit Days Apart. Can Scientists Prove Climate Change Caused Them?
entry.content: Vanuatu plans to argue in international courts that the U.S. and others must do more to protect the world from global warming.

entry.title: Bill Richardson, Former New Mexico Governor and U.N. Ambassador, Dies at 75
entry.content: The Democrat also served as energy secretary for Bill Clinton and had aspired to be the countryâ€™s first Hispanic president.
